item.title: Ranbir Kapoor's niece Samara Sahni can't stop smiling as she enjoys fan moment with AP Dhillon - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor's niece Samara Sahni can't stop smiling as she enjoys fan moment with AP Dhillon

Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Samara Sahni, niece of Bollywood actor Ranbir Kapoor, attended AP Dhillon's recent concert in Delhi and was thrilled to meet the popular Punjabi singer, leaving her all smiles.

  • Samara attended the concert with her father, Bharat Sahni.
  • She excitedly posed for photos with AP Dhillon, showcasing her joy.
  • Samara wore sunglasses featuring 'AP' initials and a white heart, adding to her fan girl vibe.
  • The concert was part of Dhillon's 'The Brownprint India Tour', which began on December 7.
“Samara couldn't stop smiling while posing with the singer.”

The event highlighted the joy of celebrity encounters and the excitement they bring to fans, showcased through Samara's joyful experience.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna Makes Controversial Comment On Ranbir Kapoor Playing Lord Ram: 'If You're A Chhichhora...' - News18
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna Criticizes Ranbir Kapoor's Casting as Lord Ram

Date: December 19, 2024

Source: News18

Mukesh Khanna has raised eyebrows with his remarks concerning Ranbir Kapoor, who has been cast as Lord Ram in the upcoming film Ramayana. Khanna expressed concern that Kapoor's previous roles could affect how audiences perceive his portrayal of such a revered character.

  • Khanna hesitated to comment, fearing backlash, but affirmed that comparisons with Arun Govil are inevitable.
  • He stated that whoever plays Ram must embody the character in their real life as well.
  • Khanna highlighted that the public reception of actors like Prabhas should inform casting choices.
  • Ranbir Kapoor's role is significant for the Kapoor family, and he hopes Kapoor's recent negative portrayal in Animal won't overshadow his performance as Ram.
  • Details about other cast members include Sai Pallavi as Sita and potential casting for Hanuman.
“If you’re playing Ram, you’re not allowed to party and drink. But who am I to decide who plays Ram?” - Mukesh Khanna

The film is set to release in two parts, with the first part launching on Diwali 2026 and the second on Diwali 2027.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office: Allu Arjun Cancels Aamir Khan’s 3,640 Days Old Record Despite Being The Toughest Nut To Crack! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office: Allu Arjun Cancels Aamir Khan’s 3,640 Days Old Record Despite Being The Tough

Publication Date: December 18, 2024   Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 has achieved remarkable success at the box office within its first 14 days, setting new records and surpassing previous milestones held by major films like Baahubali 2 and Aamir Khan's PK.

  • Pushpa 2 has set a new record for the highest-grossing Hindi dubbed South Indian film.
  • On its 14th day, the movie earned ₹17 crore, the highest collection for a Hindi film on that day.
  • The film has quickly risen in popularity, grossing a total of ₹618.50 crore within two weeks.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“Pushpa 2 has done the unthinkable, and its numbers are beasting at the box office even 14 days after the film has arrived, creating new records every single day.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 has not only broken long-standing records but has also reshaped the box office landscape for Hindi films, showcasing the massive appeal of South Indian cinema.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Anil Thadanis Pushpa 2 locks horns with Baby John over screens; leaves exhibitors in a bind with advance booking halted - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: Anil Thadani’s Pushpa 2 locks horns with Baby John over screens; leaves exhibitors in a bind with advance booking halted

Publication Date: December 2023 Source: Bollywood Hungama

Pushpa 2 – The Rule continues to perform strongly but has faced issues with advance bookings due to a conflict between its distributor and that of Baby John, which releases on December 25.

  • Advance bookings for Pushpa 2 have been halted in many theaters for the coming weekend.
  • Anil Thadani, distributor of Pushpa 2, has mandated equal showings with Baby John for the holiday period.
  • The conflict is described as a tactical move by Thadani against PVR Inox Pictures, distributor of Baby John.
  • Theatres are waiting for a resolution to start bookings for Pushpa 2 while limited bookings have begun in some cinemas.
“If they don’t accept Thadani ji’s demands, theatres will not be able to play Pushpa 2 over this weekend.”

The ongoing conflict highlights the competitive nature of film releases during the holiday season, and both sides are working towards a compromise.

item.title: Devoleena Bhattacharjee welcomes her first child, a baby boy, with husband Shanawaz Shaikh - The Indian Express
item.description:
Devoleena Bhattacharjee Welcomes Baby Boy with Husband Shanawaz Shaikh

Updated: December 19, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Actor Devoleena Bhattacharjee and her husband Shanawaz Shaikh have welcomed their first child, a baby boy, on December 18. The announcement was made by Devoleena via her Instagram.

  • Devoleena expressed her joy of becoming a mother on social media.
  • Fans and friends congratulated the couple in the comments section.
  • She shared a video stating, "Hello world! Our little angel BOY is here ♥️🧿 18•12•2024".
  • Devoleena married Shanawaz in December 2022.
“I’m excited about my new journey into motherhood. This birthday feels different and extra special for both me and my husband.” - Devoleena Bhattacharjee

This joyous moment marks a significant milestone in the couple's lives, as they embark on the journey of parenthood together.

item.title: Crisp runtime locked for Upendra’s UI - 123telugu
item.description:
Crisp Runtime Locked for Upendra’s UI

Published on Dec 19, 2024 3:02 pm IST

Kannada star Upendra's latest movie, UI, is set to release tomorrow in cinemas across multiple languages, including Telugu. The film, directed by Upendra himself, has a runtime of 2 hours and 12 minutes and explores globally pressing issues such as climate change, all while maintaining a satirical perspective on political dynamics.

  • Movie directed by Upendra, releasing in multiple languages.
  • Crisp runtime of 2 hours and 12 minutes.
  • The film addresses climate change and political dynamics.
  • Features a stellar cast including Sunny Leone and Murali Sharma.
  • Produced by Lahari Films and others, with music by Ajaneesh B Loknath.
“UI promises a high-octane, gripping experience from start to finish.”

This film blends social awareness with entertainment, indicating its dual purpose of engaging audiences while provoking thought on important issues.

item.title: John Cena vs Roman Reigns: Which WWE superstar has higher net worth - India.com
item.description:
John Cena vs Roman Reigns: Which WWE superstar has higher net worth

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: India.com

There’s an enduring debate among WWE fans, and it's all about deciding who is truly the greatest of all time. The argument frequently swings between John Cena and Roman Reigns, reflecting their dominance in the wrestling world.

  • John Cena has a net worth of approximately $80 million, primarily due to his career as a 16-time World Champion in WWE.
  • Roman Reigns has a net worth of $14 million and earns an estimated $5 million per year from WWE.
  • John Cena's WWE salary is reported to be around $10 million per year.
  • The financial comparison favors John Cena, highlighting his significant economic success in the wrestling industry.
"If we compare their financial status, it's clear that John Cena's economic success is tremendous, boasting an impressive net worth of $80 million. This notably overshadows Roman Reigns, whose net worth amounts to $14 million."

In conclusion, while both superstars have achieved remarkable careers in WWE, John Cena's financial achievements place him significantly ahead of Roman Reigns.

item.title: Kareena Kapoor channels Anjali from Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham as she cheers for Jeh at his school function. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kareena Kapoor Channels Anjali from Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham While Cheering for Jeh at School Function

Dec 19, 2024 - Hindustan Times

Kareena Kapoor was seen at her son Jeh's school function, cheering him on as he performed. The moment was reminiscent of her character Anjali from the movie Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham, which resonated with fans.

  • Kareena attended the event with her husband Saif Ali Khan and elder son Taimur.
  • A viral video showed Kareena excitedly cheering for Jeh, who performed in an elephant costume.
  • Fans drew parallels between Jeh’s performance and Kajol’s character Anjali from the movie.
  • Kareena expressed her love for motherhood in her book, discussing the balance of being a mother and an actress.
Kareena Kapoor: “My mother is also a strong role model for me... I now have these two tots in my life who make every day feel a little crazy, a little special, a little exhausting, and a little rewarding.”

The event highlighted the joys of parenting and how celebrities like Kareena can resonate with everyday experiences, reminding many of their childhood and family dynamics.

item.title: Rifle Club Review | A Mild Wild West Set In the Western Ghats - Lensmen Reviews
item.description:
Rifle Club Review | A Mild Wild West Set In the Western Ghats

Publication Date: December 19, 2024

Source: Lensmen Reviews

The movie Rifle Club creatively merges the Wild West theme with the scenic backdrop of Kerala's hill stations. It follows a Malayalam superstar's training day at a rifle club in 1991, culminating in an engaging face-off between rival gangs.

  • The film's runtime is approximately 114 minutes.
  • A focus on character development and the club's dynamics.
  • The screenplay draws parallels between the narrative and hunting.
  • Strong performances by Dileesh Pothan (Avaran) and Anurag Kashyap (as the antagonist).
  • Vibrant cinematography and a notable musical score enhance the film’s ambiance.
“While the pre-climax face-off between the two gangs is pretty slick and engaging, somewhere, I felt the finale needed a bit more refinement to have that wow factor.”

The film offers a blend of humor and intensity, though it concludes with a slightly underwhelming finale. However, it reassures viewers that Aashiq Abu's creative prowess remains intact.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna reacts to Ranbir Kapoor's casting as Lord Ram in 'Ramayana': 'If they're a lampat chhicchor - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna reacts to Ranbir Kapoor's casting as Lord Ram in 'Ramayana'

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Mukesh Khanna has spoken out regarding Ranbir Kapoor's casting as Lord Ram in the upcoming 'Ramayana', expressing concerns about how personal behavior may reflect on such iconic roles.

  • Khanna highlights the importance of the actor's off-screen character when portraying revered figures.
  • He notes that a person's true nature may influence public perception of their role.
  • Khanna's comments emphasize the cultural significance of properly representing mythological characters.
“If they're a lampat chhicchora in real life, it will show...”

The discussion surrounding casting in mythological adaptations has gained traction, reflecting broader dialogues about celebrity and responsibility in the film industry.

item.title: Indian 3 will release in theaters only, says Shankar - 123telugu
item.description:
Indian 3 Will Release Exclusively in Theaters, Confirms Director Shankar

Published on Dec 19, 2024 by 123telugu

The highly anticipated film Indian 3 will see its release exclusively in theaters, according to renowned director Shankar Shanmugam. This announcement comes on the heels of his previous film, Indian 2, which faced criticism.

  • Shankar expresses disappointment over the negative reviews for Indian 2 but is optimistic about his upcoming projects.
  • Indian 3 is expected to be a theatrical experience that will appeal to Kamal Haasan's fans.
  • Game Changer, another film by Shankar, is also gearing up for promotions and has a trailer release expected soon.
“I believe my work on Game Changer and Indian 3 will speak for itself. I’m sure both will be enjoyable theatrical experiences.” - Shankar Shanmugam

Shankar's commitment to theatrical releases aims to elevate the cinematic experience for audiences, particularly after the mixed success of Indian 2.

item.title: Kabir Khan’s next collaboration with Karan Johar: Salman Khan vs. Vicky Kaushal in the race for the lead role! - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Kabir Khan's New Film: Salman Khan and Vicky Kaushal Compete for Lead Role

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Kabir Khan is transitioning back into commercial cinema with a new action thriller for Dharma Productions, focusing on casting either Salman Khan or Vicky Kaushal.

  • Kabir Khan's new film is being developed in partnership with Karan Johar's Dharma Productions.
  • The film is described as an action-packed thriller currently in the pre-production stage.
  • Salman Khan and Vicky Kaushal are potential leads for the film.
  • Both actors have shown interest but are waiting for the final script.
“Kabir Khan is developing a commercial action film in association with Karan Johar's Dharma Production.”

The film marks Kabir Khan’s return to delivering a blockbuster after successes like Bajrangi Bhaijaan.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Govinda’s son, Yashvardhan Ahuja set for acting debut in a love story directed by National Award Winner, Sai Rajesh - PINKVILLA
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: Govinda’s son, Yashvardhan Ahuja set for acting debut in a love story directed by National Award Winner, Sai Rajesh

Published on Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Yashvardhan Ahuja, the son of the legendary actor Govinda, is set to make his debut in a yet untitled love story directed by National Award winner Sai Rajesh, scheduled to begin filming in 2025. This marks the continuation of Govinda's cinematic legacy through his son.

  • Yashvardhan has auditioned and secured his role in the film based on merit.
  • The film aims to create a unique love story with original music to enhance the narrative.
  • A nationwide search for the female lead is ongoing, with over 14,000 audition clips submitted so far.
  • Producers are looking to begin filming by summer 2025.
“The yet untitled love story will bring the second generation of Govinda’s legacy to the big screen,” revealed a source.

This film not only represents a new chapter for Yashvardhan but also a continuation of his father's impactful career in Indian cinema.

item.title: Star hero says his 3D film won’t cause a headache - 123telugu
item.description:
Star hero says his 3D film won’t cause a headache

Published on Dec 19, 2024 1:00 pm IST

The upcoming Malayalam children’s fantasy drama Barroz, directed by Mohanlal, is set to release on December 25, 2024, after multiple delays. In recent promotions, Mohanlal reassured audiences that the 3D experience would not lead to discomfort.

  • The film marks Mohanlal's directorial debut.
  • Barroz is based on the novel Barroz: Guardian of D’Gama’s Treasure.
  • Key cast includes Maya, Cesar Lorente Raton, Kallirroi Tziafeta, and others.
  • Mohanlal emphasizes the quality of the 3D viewing experience, aiming to eliminate common complaints regarding headaches.
  • The movie is produced by Antony Perumbavoor under Aashirvad Cinemas.
“Luckily, we came up with a good product, which I think so. A few saw the film, and thankfully, they didn’t have a headache.” - Mohanlal

Overall, Barroz aims to deliver a unique 3D cinematic experience while engaging a young audience through its fantasy narrative.

item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna Approach 1000 Crore Mark

Date: Updated on 14th day since release, Source: Unknown

As of the morning of the second Thursday, the Bollywood film Pushpa 2, led by Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, has crossed 975 crores in box office collections and is set to enter the exclusive 1000 crore club soon.

  • The film has demonstrated significant staying power at the box office over its second week.
  • Audiences have responded positively, contributing to its impressive collection figures.
  • Pushpa 2's success marks a significant milestone in the careers of its lead actors.
“The film is rapidly approaching the historic 1000 crore milestone,” remarked an industry analyst.

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 continues to break records, solidifying its place as one of the year's biggest hits.

item.title: Mufasa: The Lion King Box Office Preview: Shah Rukh Khan, Mahesh Babu boost prospects in India - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Mufasa: The Lion King Box Office Preview: Shah Rukh Khan, Mahesh Babu boost prospects in India

Published on: Dec 19, 2024  |  Source: Pinkvilla

Mufasa: The Lion King is expected to perform strongly in India, potentially matching the success of its predecessor, The Lion King. The film leverages the star power of Shah Rukh Khan and Mahesh Babu to draw audiences in.

  • Mufasa could open close to The Lion King's first day collection of Rs. 11.10 crore in India.
  • The film has already sold 35K tickets in national chains for its first day, with expectations to reach 60-70K.
  • Given the strong pre-sales for dubbed versions, particularly in Telugu, Mufasa may exceed Rs. 10 crore on opening day.
  • The Lion King's success in India sets a comparative backdrop for Mufasa's potential performance.
“India could very well be the only market where Mufasa opens on par with or at the very least closest to The Lion King.”

In conclusion, Mufasa: The Lion King is positioned well for a successful opening in India, driven by local star appeal and positive pre-sales.

item.title: Ajay Devgn and Rakul Preet Singh starrer De De Pyaar De 2 to hit the screens in November next year and here are the details! - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
De De Pyaar De 2: Release Date Announced for November 2025

Publication Date: November 2023, Source: Bollywood Hungama

The makers of the romantic comedy De De Pyaar De have announced a sequel titled De De Pyaar De 2, set for release on November 14, 2025. Fans can expect a new storyline featuring humor, romance, and drama, with R Madhavan expected to play a significant role.

  • Title: De De Pyaar De 2
  • Release Date: November 14, 2025
  • Starring: Ajay Devgn, Rakul Preet Singh, R Madhavan
  • Directed by: Anshul Sharma
  • Filming locations: Punjab, Mumbai, London
“This time, a twist is expected to be in the form of R Madhavan.”

The sequel promises to add depth and excitement to the original story, resonating with fans once again.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh flaunts her mangalsutra in first public appearance after marriage to Antony Thattil. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh Flaunts Mangalsutra in First Public Appearance After Marriage

Date: December 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Keerthy Suresh made her first public appearance after her wedding to Antony Thattil at the Baby John Christmas bash, radiating post-wedding glow and showcasing her mangalsutra.

  • Keerthy recently married Antony Thattil in Goa.
  • She attended a Christmas bash with co-stars Varun Dhawan and Wamiqa Gabbi.
  • Keerthy wore a red bodycon dress at the event.
  • Fans praised her looks, commenting on her glow post-marriage.
  • Her wedding photos went viral online, including a picture with actor Vijay.
  • She is set to debut in Bollywood with the movie Baby John, releasing on December 25.
“She is glowing and how after marriage.” – Fan comment

In conclusion, Keerthy's first public appearance post-wedding has been met with enthusiasm from fans appreciating her beauty and the celebration of her new life.

item.title: Nidhhi Agerwal’s pic leaked from the Raja Saab sets? Actress clarifies - 123telugu
item.description:
Nidhhi Agerwal Addresses Leaked Photo Rumors from Raja Saab Sets

Published on Dec 19, 2024 by 123telugu

Nidhhi Agerwal, who stars alongside Prabhas in the highly anticipated film The Raja Saab, has addressed recent rumors about a leaked photo. Directed by Maruthi, the film is progressing on schedule, with the makers confirming its grand release on April 10, 2025, dismissing any reports of delays.

  • Nidhhi clarified that the circulating photo is from an ad shoot, not the film.
  • The Raja Saab promises an exciting experience with a stellar cast including Malavika Mohanan and Sanjay Dutt.
  • The teaser for the film is set to release soon.
“Hi fam! This is not a leaked photo from #TheRajaSaab movie.. it’s from an ad shoot I have done.. we will come with updates very soon 🥰 trust me, it’s worth waiting for ☺️❤️” - Nidhhi Agerwal

The ongoing excitement for The Raja Saab reflects its anticipated popularity and the engagement of its cast with fans on social media.

item.title: Pic Talk : Nidhhi Agerwal’s sizzling pic from The Raja Saab leaked - 123telugu
item.description:
Nidhhi Agerwal's Leaked Pic from The Raja Saab Sparks Excitement

Published on Dec 19, 2024 12:06 pm IST

The highly-anticipated film The Raja Saab features Nidhhi Agerwal as the female lead, and a recent leaked image from the set has gone viral, building excitement among fans.

  • Nidhhi Agerwal plays the lead role in Prabhas' upcoming film The Raja Saab.
  • The film is directed by Maruthi and is confirmed for release on April 10, 2025.
  • The leaked image shows Agerwal looking elegant, prompting excitement for more official content.
  • The music is composed by Thaman, and the film is being produced by People Media Factory.
  • A teaser is expected to be released soon.
“The film is on track for its grand release.”

Fans are eagerly awaiting further updates as The Raja Saab prepares for its upcoming release.

item.title: Laapataa Ladies' Oscars drama explained: How India selects 'official' entry, what is Film Federation of India's role - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Laapataa Ladies' Oscars Drama Explained: How India Selects Official Entry

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

As Laapataa Ladies crashes out of the Oscars race, this article explores the selection process for India's 'official' entry to the Academy Awards, shedding light on the role of the Film Federation of India.

  • This year marks the 23rd consecutive year that India will not have a film in the Oscars' Best International Feature Film category.
  • The Film Federation of India (FFI) is responsible for selecting India's official entry for the Oscars.
  • Laapataa Ladies was chosen from nearly 30 contenders, including notable films like Animal and All We Imagine as Light.
  • Only one film can be submitted as an 'official' entry, but filmmakers can still submit titles independently for other categories.
  • Historically, three Indian films have been nominated for the Oscars: Mother India, Salaam Bombay, and Lagaan.
“It has never been without drama.”

The ongoing struggles in selecting a film for international representation highlight the challenges faced by Indian cinema on the global stage.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: After Hera Pheri, Tabu reunites with Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan on Bhooth Bangla franchise - PINKVILLA
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: After Hera Pheri, Tabu reunites with Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan on Bhooth Bangla franchise

Published on: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Bhooth Bangla is a highly anticipated film set to release in 2026, featuring Akshay Kumar and Tabu among other notable stars.

  • Tabu has signed on for a key role after a long hiatus with Akshay Kumar since their last film together in 2000.
  • The film is described as a horror comedy combining elements of Indian mythology.
  • Producer Ekta Kapoor is involved, aiming to develop Bhooth Bangla into a franchise.
  • Shooting is currently underway, with a release date set for April 2, 2026.
“Tabu is reuniting with Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan after their last collaboration on Hera Pheri in 2000. The actress loved her part and the script, which marries horror and humour with Indian Mythology.”

Bhooth Bangla is set to mark a significant comeback of the beloved duo on screen in a new comedic horror setting.

item.title: Arbaaz Khan visits ex-wife Malaika Arora’s new restaurant with parents, sans wife Sshura. Watch video - The Indian Express
item.description:
Arbaaz Khan visits ex-wife Malaika Arora’s new restaurant with parents, sans wife Sshura. Watch video

Date: Wednesday, December 12, 2024 Source: The Indian Express

The Khan family had a heartwarming reunion in Mumbai at a lunch hosted by Malaika Arora, attended by her ex-husband Arbaaz Khan and their son Arhaan, marking a rare family outing.

  • Arbaaz Khan visited the restaurant with his parents, Salim and Salma Khan, and Helen.
  • Notably, his wife Sshura was absent from the gathering.
  • Videos circulated showing Arhaan assisting his grandmother while climbing the restaurant stairs.
  • The family continues to share a strong bond despite the separation of Arbaaz and Malaika.
  • Malaika was seen greeting guests in a stylish black outfit.
“He resembles his father, Arbaaz, in both habits and personality.” - Malaika Arora on her son, Arhaan.

This gathering illustrates the ongoing co-parenting relationship between Arbaaz and Malaika, despite their past marriage and subsequent divorce.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Shahid Kapoor and Triptii Dimri to kick off shoot for Vishal Bhardwaj-Sajid Nadiadwalas grand action entertainer in South Mumbai - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Shahid Kapoor and Triptii Dimri Begin Filming for Vishal Bhardwaj's New Action Film

Date: October 10, 2023   Source: Bollywood Hungama

Producers Sajid Nadiadwala and Vishal Bhardwaj are set to commence filming their new action entertainer starring Shahid Kapoor and Triptii Dimri, starting January 6, 2025, for a scheduled release on December 5, 2026.

  • The film will feature Nana Patekar and Randeep Hooda alongside the leads.
  • Filming will begin at Ballard Pier in South Mumbai, with major set constructions underway.
  • The first shooting schedule is planned for 20-25 days with all main actors participating.
  • The production designer Mustafa Stationwala is known for his work on major films like Laal Singh Chaddha and Airlift.
  • Sajid Nadiadwala has multiple releases planned for 2025 including new films starring Salman Khan and Tiger Shroff.
“Sajid Nadiadwala has gone all out, ensuring that the set is grand but at the same time, authentic to the storyline.”

This upcoming film exemplifies the continued collaboration between renowned Bollywood figures, promising to deliver an engaging action-packed storyline to audiences in 2026.

item.title: Balagam actor Mogilayya is no more - 123telugu
item.description:
Balagam Actor Mogilayya is No More

Published on Dec 19, 2024 by 123telugu

The small film Balagam (2023) became a massive blockbuster, earning recognition and accolades for many artists. Tragically, folk singer Darshanam Mogilayya (67), who graced the movie’s final song, passed away this morning at a hospital in Hyderabad.

  • Mogilayya had been battling kidney and heart-related ailments.
  • He received support from the Telangana government, Megastar Chiranjeevi, and director Venu Yeldandi during his treatment.
  • His passing has left the film community in deep grief.
“We offer our heartfelt condolences to his family during this difficult time.”

This loss marks a significant moment for those who cherished Mogilayya’s contributions to music and cinema.

item.title: OTT Review: Leela Vinodham – Telugu film on ETV Win - 123telugu
item.description:
Leela Vinodham Telugu Movie Review

Release Date: December 19, 2024

Source: 123telugu.com

Leela Vinodham is the latest web film that premiered today on ETV Win. Popular YouTuber Shanmukh Jaswanth and the charming Anagha Ajith play the lead roles. Read our review to find out how it measures up.

Key Points

  • The story is set in 2008, focusing on a student, PMRK Prasad, who struggles to express his feelings for his classmate, Leela.
  • It captures the uncertainty of teenage love and nostalgia for the era before mobile phones were commonplace.
  • Shanmukh Jaswanth and Anagha Ajith deliver decent performances, with Mirchi Saran standing out for his comedic role.
  • The screenplay has issues with pacing, and certain scenes feel slow and underdeveloped.
  • While the film has appealing elements, it ultimately does not deliver a memorable experience.
“Leela Vinodham is a village love story that works in a few parts but ultimately falls short of being memorable.”

In conclusion, while the film captures a nostalgic charm and has commendable performances, it struggles with pacing and emotional depth. Viewers might find other entertainment options more satisfying.
